amendment.description: To protect Americans from a $1,000,000,000,000 tax increase and provide for pro-growth revenue-neutral comprehensive tax reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 156 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 49.

action.text: Amendment SA 156 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S2130-2134; text: CR S2130) To protect Americans from a $1,000,000,000,000 tax increase and provide for pro-growth revenue-neutral comprehensive tax reform.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 156 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 156 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 49.
